name: synchronously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal in a way that involves things happening or being done at the same time or speed: Dragonflies beat their two sets of wings synchronously. The predator eggs hatch synchronously with the emergence of the wasp larvae.
education
  specialized with a teacher and students taking part in a lesson at the same time, either physically together in one place, or using the internet: Students can study synchronously or asynchronously. Small-group and one-to-one teacher-learner interaction, both synchronously and asynchronously, forms part of this learning system.
